product_name: Point 65 Tequila Sit-On-Top Kayak - Bow Section - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The Point 65 Tequila Sit-On-Top kayak bow section joins the the Tequila stern section (sold separately) to form a sit-on-top kayak that's ideal for paddling on calm rivers, lakes and protected coves.
short_description: The Point 65 Tequila Sit-On-Top kayak bow section joins the the Tequila stern section (sold separately) to form a sit-on-top kayak that's ideal for paddling on calm rivers, lakes and protected coves.
